EmailTemplate.name: SW: YPPG Attending PIE but SW cannot attend
EmailTemplate.subject: YPPG confirmed PIE attendence but SW cannot attend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name} has confirmed that they can attend the parents information evening but their support worker cannot attend. Please liase with both to arrange an alternative meeting.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a YPPG has confirmed that they can attend the PIE but the SW cannot attend.
